articles.description: This is your chance to bag a bargain ahead of the Christmas rush - but you'll have to move quickly.
articles.content:
Click Frenzys annual online mega-sale is set to help Australian shoppers get a head start on their Christmas lists by offering up to 99 per cent off a vast range of products.
Starting from 7pm (AEST… [+5489 chars]
